summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from an individual at a correctional institution, indicating they will be unavailable from August 12-16, 2019, and providing contact information for FCI Estill and MCC New York. The document appears to be routine administrative correspondence.

events.title: Out of Office Period
events.description: The sender indicates they will be out of the office from August 12-16, 2019.

locations.name: FCI Estill
locations.context: Federal Correctional Institution mentioned as a point of contact.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.context: Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York mentioned as an alternative contact.

keyFacts: The document is an out-of-office email reply dated August 10, 2019.
It provides contact information for two federal correctional institutions: FCI Estill in South Carolina and MCC New York.
The sender's name appears to be redacted or obscured in the 'From' field, shown as 'MINIMIE'.
